values:
--; I only use this to complain about everything. So now I have just a for everything journal. Complaints, comments, everything. So my new 'thing' is my xanga. 
See me there. 
Via xanga:
  
http://www.xanga.com/Da_Ferret

^^ Thanks a bunch.

 -Shiloh



MAHAHAH! Liz was here... woo.. ahemm... uhh... yeeeeahhh...

I'm all alone.

I have no friends.
Ihave no boyfriend.
I have no family.
None of those that care at least.

Ah, Ashleighs back (with my shoe. lirl). Lauren never did call. I guess she's forgotten about me. No matter there. Everyone forgets about me. -sighs- I was there, then I wasn't. Its not like she couldn't replace me. And as these little things are resolved in my mind and I focus on myself more and more I get more and more distant from those I love. u_u I don't know why but my parents are flipping and my friends are worried? Psh. I see no proof of that. I'm so dense. Trevor, you want to know why I don't have a boyfriend? Its because I'm not worthy. 
OF ANYTHING. You want to know why I don't cry when he, or anyone tells me they hate me?
Cause it has no heart to reach. I'm nothing. A mere shadow. I'm a dense, lying, ugly, person who has nothing but a few friends left. u_u

I'm a failure. I've never done anything right. I can't get good grades, I can't be everyones friend, I can't not want stuff, I can't be perfect. And my failure is driving me to the need of perfection. My family, it seems, is going poor. And what do I do? I get careless and stupid. And I fail all over again! I'm a failure! -bashes head into a wall- Argh! X_X I refuse to be addicted to my computer any longer. NO LONGER will you see me constantly on AIM. NO LONGER will you see me posting constantly. NO LONGER will you see me with new stuff and wanting more. No. Longer. Will. You. See. Me. Be. A. Failure. I won't allow myself! Goodbye (for now) to everything that makes me who and what I am!

Okay, listen up. Many people on this site are democrat. Most of them can't even VOTE so you know what? They should all just shut the poop up. Bush is not a bad person. The media, whom is the only source for quick easy information and the school system teachers are highly liberal. It's kinda obvious. The media alters all good things into bad things. They tell us what we want to hear. If you want to hear something about how Bush sucks, then turn on your TV and sit down. That's all there is to it. Bush is bringing troops home in July. He's taken care of many of the threats we faced as a nation. BUT of course the Media will not tell you that. Nor will it tell you the following:

After the 1993 World Trade Center bombing, which killed six and injured 1000; President Clinton promised that those responsible would be hunted down and punished.
BUSH COVERED IT!

After the 1995 bombing in Saudi Arabia, which killed five U.S. military personnel; Clinton promised that those responsible would be hunted down and punished.
BUSH COVERED IT!

After the 1996 Khobar Towers bombing in Saudi Arabia, which killed 19 and injured 200 U.S. military personnel; Clinton promised that those responsible would be hunted down and punished.
BUSH COVERED IT!

After the 1998 bombing of U.S. embassies in Africa, which killed 224 and injured 5,000; Clinton promised that those responsible! would be hunted down and punished.
BUSH COVERED IT!

After the 2000 bombing of the USS Cole, which killed 17 and injured 39 U.S. sailors; Clinton promised that those responsible would be hunted down and punished.
BUSH COVERED IT!

Maybe if Clinton had kept his promise, an estimated 3,000 people in New York and Washington, D.C. that are now dead would be alive today.

And, now that Bush is taking action to bring these people to justice, we have Democrats charging him with being a war monger...


ANOTHER THING

I am fed up with Liberals constantly in my face pleading their cases. NOT 1 Liberal that I have come across has any respect for anybody elses point of view or beliefs, yet they pride themselves on being tolerant to others. They don't understand what debating is. They prefer to argue and in some cases take it to a whole new level with personal insults. I do not seek these people out. They find me. I do NOT deliver an invitation to hear their regurgitated reasons for hating President Bush, or why they chose to become a Democrat, because I really don't give a $h1+ what they think and feel. If I had a penny for everytime I heard these people call Republicans "Hitler", I'd be shacking up in Bill Gates' neighborhood!

Time just seems to go and keep going. It doesn't stop for ANYONE. Let alone the person you want it to. Lauren is moving to Conneticut...on MONDAY. I'm going to miss her so much. No matter how many letters, visits, and phone calls, they won't be able to replace what SHOULD'VE happened. Am I being selfish? 'Will you remember me? Cause I know I won't forget you.' I guess thats true. I'm afraid she'll forget me. And lets not even start on everyone else. All my 8th grade friends are going to high school, my friends are moving, making new friends. I'm just drifting away and I know they could care less. It's getting harder and harder to get through the day. I'm surving and I won't do anything rash, but I just feel like crying. Just crawling under my bed and sobbing. No school. No stress. No worries. Just cries. Yeah, well, I'm going to be going. I'll make a quick update later. 

 -Shiloh

i'm so confused! Why is this happening?! I blame myself for everything thats happening! Kristy, How could you?! You snitched every time something has happened. you seem to cause these troubles. Ariel, stop holding grudges, they'll come back to haunt you. x_x Chas...I dunno whats going on between you guys...Liz, can't wait till' Friday, get all of this off my back. x_x Holly, can't wait to meet Kurtis! ^_^ He sounds awesome. This is all...so...grr...I feel really light headed. I'm going to go lay down. x_x

-sighs- Why does having friends have to be so hard? Can't we just be friends without having fights, pains, and so much more? We're doomed to be like this. To hell with the human race and its diffcultness. u_u I really wish I could make you feel diffrent... Chas, Ariel...I honestly don't support what you've done. Lauren...you did what YOU thought was right. I commend you for this...and Patty...I'm sorry its all going in circles. And Kristy...how could you let something so important slip? The day I least want to go to school, I have to go. I have to get this figured out. I'm determined to. -sighs- I blame me.

My mom called us (me and Codee) ungrateful because yesterday she bought me a shirt (long sleeved) And I told her I didn't like long sleeves and she got kinda mad. Because I didn't say thank you or anything and again today because we went to the mall and bought Codee stuff for her birthday because she didn't like what my mom had gotten her (--;) And she didn't say thank you. x_x I have got to admit, I'm a bit mad at Codee. She got to go into EVERY shop she wanted to (Wet Seal, The Body Shop, Dillards, JC Pennys, Limited 2, etc. etc.) and I had to wait for her to try and clothes and blah blah blah, but when I went into a store (FYE and Pacsun) We had to leave 5 minuted into looking. FYE she was done shopping and I wasn't and she walked in there all: Come on, lets go! Because SHE was done shopping. In my opinion, How conceited. >_< Grr to you. I'm not ungreatful...or greedy, am I? =/ It just kind of made me mad. My mom was going to get me the Vans I wanted, but we couldn't because *Codee* was done shopping, ready to go home, and didn't like the store I was in. >_<

Alot has been happening. Too much to type up here. In short, alot of stressful things are happening to me right now. I put up a new layout, the background is some of the luffly Tiva's art, you can view at: studiotiva.com 
x_x I got a postition as an 8th grade office assistant for next year, can't wait to get a class where you do near to nothing. Oodles of fun I tell you. Lauren is moving. I wish that would drag on a lot longer. I don't want her to leave me. I lubbles meh Lauren! -snug- :D I made plans with Holly, but then she made plans with my sister so I'm going to hang out with Lauren this weekend (or today. xD) I got all A's and 2 C's on my last report cards. I swore to myself I'd bring my grades up. And I will. Watch me. I shall get all A's. =^_^= My grades went down in middle school. that got my parents mad, I used to make straight A's. -shrug- Things happen. Middle school has ALOT of work. X_x Poo. Gosh Poop I tell you! At lunch, Trevor kept staring at me, it was scaring me. I was with Kristy because Lauren, ariel, and Chastity didn't come, and we're a little mad at Patty, so I was with Kristy, we didn't sit with them their all: -stares- And I'm all: Ohmibob!!! STALKERS! -flee- :DDDD Today ish Friday. Woop Woop! -victory dance- I'm so excitied, and I just can't hide it... XDD Well anywho, in 7:57, so I'm off to finish getting ready for school. ^_^ And Liz: Yes. I cried. It was emotional. Do you have a problem with it? xP

Yesterday was Easter! Fwee! :D I met up with my old best friend Casey, from Pre-School. I forgot all about her. x_x But it was fun. She's alot like me. We went skateboarding and ate candy. Mmmm...candy...-drool- Then she had to leave and my mom and dad took me to see the Passion of Christ movie. Wow. It was the best, and the worst movie I have ever seen. I've never cried in a movie before, I cried 3 times. VERY bloody and sad. Made my back hurt when he got beaten. Eheh...some guy got his eyeballs poked out. I did really like the movie though. ^-^ Well anywho, gotta go, schooool. >_< See ya!

Long Time, no update, so here goes:
I went to the movies with Kristy, Ariel, Chastity, and Patty. Ariel and Kristy had to leave before the movie, so it was just us. We saw Scooby Doo 2. Patty dared Chastity and I to go into the mens bathroom and when we went in there Chastity goes: Are there any sexthy men in here? And some man came out and looked at us, we're all: -FLEE- He was following us around so we got scared and went to the movie. LoL! Scooby Doo 2 rocks! :DDD We were rolling down the hill and stuff and screaming and wrestling and stuff. ^-^ Good times, goooood times! ~^ As Liz would say! Har Har. They spent the night and all, then on Saturday we got bored and went to the mall. (Without money I might add) And I ended up spending the night at Patty's. THEY WERE GREEN PATTY! We watched a Brittney Spears concert. XD And Patty kept giving me a wedgie so when I went to bed I was all curled around Chastity. XDDD It was funny, we got up shes like, "Man...you are so weird to sleep with." XD We went out to breakfast, blah blah blah, went skateboarding, fun stuff! :D I have a sun burn though. >> Owie. Patty is stalking Garret, we went to his house and she knows what window is his, thanks to Trevor. XDDDD Nice move Trevor! We know shes a stalker! ~^ But its okay, we love her anywho! :DD Chastity and Trevor were holding hands and I go, "Be careful! You don't know where thats been!" so she was chasing me and wiping her hand on me. XDD Trevor was all: Aww, thats insulting. :DDD Then we walked to WinnDixie to get a soda and candy. yummay... :DDD Then I went home and blah. I went to school. x.x How dull. Today, 8 fights before 5th period. Wooooah! :DD Lauren and Kristy might fight. I don't really want them too...x.x Its a shame, their both my friends. I have a dress rehersal tommrow for "Blanca Flor" Some play in Language Arts. We made it into "Da Blanca Flor Hood". Where we are all little gangsters. I played a dad guy so now its all "I'm not just your daddy. I'm your pimp daddy!" XDDDD Well anywho, I best be off. Such a long post...>.> If anyone read all this, I applaud you! XDDD 

  <3,
  Egg Noodle/Hotaru

Yes James. I'm coming to get you. LIRL! :DDD Narhar!! >=D Weehheee! Friday, Ariel and I are going to the movies. ^______^ Patty is such a homo!! YOU HEAR ME PATTY?!?!?!? Making me think she was moving...grrr...XD That was a fag joke! xDDD But its all gravy. -coughI WANT MY DOLLAR BACK! cough- ^______^ Ahhh, Lauren's in lubbbb!! :DDDDD Joey is such a monkey though...>> Eww..XD Luff ya anywho! Realllllly happy, I getta see Holly soon! ^_^ Weehoo!! :DD And I hope Liz is better..=\ She seemed sad and it makes me sad to see her sad. CHEER UP LIZ I LOVE YOU!!! =3 Or maybe she is already cheered up..>< I dunno, I haven't talked to her today...x_x I did alll my homework in school so its complete "Ohmibob I LOVE MY COMPUTER" time for me!! XDDDD Yup, I'm still attached to Elvis music. =/ MUST BEAT THE ADDICTION! Lol. Lool! :DDDDD I'm getting ready for Mike's wake. I really feel bad for Lindsey. Shes so sad....she stayed home from school today...I really hope shes okay...=/ even though she can be kinda bratty sometimes, shes still my friend. I hope your okay Lindsey!!! Okay, I'm gonna go, gotta get ready for the wake. =\ 

 <3,
  Hotaru

So yup. I'm doing better. Not perfect, but better. I'm working REALLY hard to get good grades. Ugh. Homework...ew....>< I hate it. I didn't even want to be in Advanced Math...I blame my mom. x_x I love Elvissssssss! Hes like soooooooo cooleo! -listening to him- You can shake an apple off an apple tree, shake a shaka, but you can't shake me! 
:DD K, I'm out. ^_______^ More homework. ><
I'm a horrible person. I'm selfish. I want Holly to be my friend. But I know I have to share. I'll pray to God that he'll take away my envy of Liz, of Codee, and of everybody. I apolgize.

Just messing around with my journal. ^^;; I love Lilo And Stitch, its like the best movie in the history of forever!!! :DD And forget my last post. If I could delete it I would. I was angry. u.u They weren't out to get me. ^_^ Paranoid! Lirl! x] Welllllllll anywhooooo...
We went to church this morning, I was so tired. x_x
Then we went out to breakfast. =3 Nummy! I had french toast and baconnnnnnn...yummmmmmm. :DD I best be off. I have homework unfourtnately. >_o Bad Shiloh! Not doing her homework. xD
If I didn't know any better I might say you were trying to get me angry or make me feel bad. Well let me tell ya, if that was your goal. You accomplished.
Note to Self: You can not use lip gloss as mascara.

Yesterday we went to Celebration Station and blah. (Liz knows I whooped her in air hockey! ;D) It was fun, we got to play laser tag, a bunch of games, and ride go karts! Vroom!! :DD Today we went to the Dali museum place. Yay for edumacation! XD I had a bunch of fun. Its depressing that Spring Break is almost over. Grrrrr...-sighs- Happy empty or half full? The glass is to big!!! -_- So anywho, now I'm tired and irratble. I just want to watch anime and sleep, and be on my computer and eat in peace. .-. Is that so much to ask? x_x XD Anywhooooo...my calendar thing is all disconfigured. So if you want to read my last post you have to read two posts down. X_X I need to fix that. x.x Sowwie? :D Oh, and a quiz while I'm at it. This was a longgggg post. X_x
You are Robin! Still young and a bit unsure of
your abilities, nonetheless you are a force to
be reckoned with, a real hidden dragon

Which Witch Hunter Robin Character Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla

Mornin' all. :] I watched .hack//sign last night.
The Guardian! DUN DUN DUN! :DDD
Its was cooleo. 
-stretchesyawn- I'm so tired. u_u 
:] Can't wait till I can go off and do stuff!! Because of Spring Break! lirl! :DDD Okay, over and out I'm off all! ^^

Why am I always so angry and vicious? I seem to strike up arguments every where I go. u.u I'm sorry. But smile, have postive feelings. People watch how you feel and relate. :\ As weird as that is. >.< I have hiccups and they hurt...ew...are they supposed to hurt? I'm going to go get some water. 
And Liz, I promise I'll be more cheerful tommrow when we go to Celebration Station. :]

:] Sorry, okay all. This is going to be my livejournal! Yay! -cheer- XD So everyone. My day was vboring but I'm so happy since its Spring Break fiannly! Yay! :DD -clap- I'm going to Celebration Station wif da Liz! :] Ahh..I better be going, since theres nuffin else to say. <.< :D

^_^ Heh, this is my first post on Livejournal! Woop! :DD  I'm transferring here from deadjournal. :] (http://www.deadjournal.com/~_moo_)
More later. 

 <3,
 Hotaru
